title: Shogo MAD with Coop-Mode and latest Patch
description:
Hi, this is my first torrent :)

It has everything you need to play this awesome Mecha-FPS from &#039;98.
Despite the old age, this game has a lot of good qualities:

- good graphics 
- fast voilent and gory gameplay, similar to AVP2
- play as human or Mecha
- flashy, heavy weapons
- 2 different endings in storymode
- great voice acting and anime characters
- No CD-key needed
- Cracked exe - no CD! :)

I also included the lates official patch (ver 22 build 14) and the
"Shogo Coop Mode"-files that lets you play the singleplayer missions with 
up to 4 friends over the internet, with extended arsenal of weapons, health and 
automatic difficulty depending on the number of players (this is great :D)
I just tried it this evening and it worked really well!

I also included a small README tutorial for installing the patch,
how to play online and the IP to one of the online servers.

Multiplayer in this game is really tense and filled with action! Robots flying between the skyscrapers with explosions and laser beams everywhere!
This game also works well with hamachi and gamespy from what I&#039;ve heard :)

The torrent consist of a RAR-compressed ISO of only ~360MB which can 
be extracted by Winrar and mounted by Daemon Tools. After the installation 
no CD or CD-key is longer required.


ENJOY AND SEED AS MUCH AS YOU CAN! :D
